title: Devi Lakshmi Kasu Haaram - A Divine Gold Necklace
materials: Emerald; Meticulously crafted with Hyderabadi Polish for a rich
features: This exquisite Haaram features a central Lakshmi pendant intricately detailed with Nakshi work. The coin (Kasu) design is interspersed with floral motifs adorned with CZ diamonds and touches of vibrant rubies. A teardrop-shaped emerald graces the top of the pendant. Delicate gold balls (gundlu) dangle gracefully from the pendantâ€™s base, adding movement and charm. The neck chain is meticulously crafted in a floral pattern to match the centerpiece.
colors: Predominantly gold with accents of ruby red
occasions: and other auspicious occasions. This piece will elevate any traditional Telugu or South Indian ensemble.
description: This Kasu Haaram is more than just jewelry; it's a symbol of prosperity and divine blessings. The craftsmanship reflects the rich heritage of Hyderabad jewelry making. The classic design ensures timeless elegance, making it a valuable addition to any heirloom jewelry collection. The combination of traditional design and modern craftsmanship ensures durability and lasting beauty.
